Key Match Events: Bangladesh uncapped wicket-keeper batter Jaker Ali was taken to hospital after an on-field collision with Anamul Haque while attempting to catch Pramod Madushan off Taskin Ahmed's bowling.
Soumya Sarkar had a neck injury after striking the advertising board while stopping the ball.
Mustafizur Rahman had to leave the game on a stretcher due to cramping.
Tanzid Hasan was selected to replace Soumya Sarkar in cases of concussions.
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed took over for Richard Kettleborough for the third ODI due to heat.
